item.title: Apple’s stock could have tough January, after this rare streak of gains
item.description: History suggests investors should be “cautious” on Apple’s stock heading into January following its recent streak of weekly gains.

item.title: Stocks Slip in Morning Trading
item.description: Major indexes, which had barely budged Thursday, remained on track to finish the Christmas week higher—and are closing in on strong full-year gains.
